motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • March 10, 2025 meeting minutes (corrected) • March 12, 2025 strategic planning retreat minutes • March 13, 2025 special called meeting minutes • March 24, 2025 meeting minutes • April 1, 2025 joint meeting minutes • Renewal of Microsoft licenses • Renewal of Fortinet maintenance licenses • MOU with U.S. Naval Criminal Investigation Service for LInX

motions.title: Table Flock Safety 6-month Trial Agreement
motions.description: Motion to table the 6-month trial agreement with Flock Safety until the April 28th city council meeting.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for legal and personnel discussion.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Luis Flores
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer Luis Flores.

specialEvents.title: 25th Anniversary of Lemonade Days Proclamation
specialEvents.description: Proclamation recognizing 25th anniversary of Lemonade Days with presentation to 2025 Honorary Queen Dolores Lauderdale.

discussionItems.title: Contract Amendment for Final Design Winters Chapel Path Phase 2
discussionItems.description: Contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for final design not to exceed $782,094.11.

discussionItems.title: Project Framework Agreement with Georgia Department of Transportation
discussionItems.description: Agreement with GDOT for Winters Chapel Path Phase 2 to receive federal funding for design.

discussionItems.title: Funding Authorization for Path between Eidson Road and Cherry Hill Lane
discussionItems.description: Contract with Hasbun Construction, LLC for $216,436 plus 10% contingency to construct 10-foot wide shared-use path.

discussionItems.title: Additional Services from TSW for Direction Dunwoody Comprehensive Plan
discussionItems.description: Update on additional services included in 2025 budget. McLeod confirmed draft Comprehensive Plan has not been approved by Council.

notes: Flock Safety drone funding request tabled for further discussion
Multiple meeting minutes approved including strategic planning retreat
